comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: these are probably on their way to the battle of the Marne (which runs through Champigny), some of the only fresh troops France could bring to the battle of the Marne to finally stop the German advance. Probably take in the last week of August or the first week of Sept ,1914.
